page.title: 03 Brechin Pageant Day
page.content: Glorious{Pageant Day Saturday saw the annual Brechin and District Round Table Pageant staged in the{Public Park.}The weather could not have been more ideal as the day,allowing the exteremly large crowds to participate in the activties aswell as to bask in the sunshine. The proceedings commenced with the Parade of floats,duly escorted by the band of marauding "Barrow Boys,"leaving{the Glebe}en route around Brechin to the Public Park. On arrival of activty with {entertainments}such as 'It's a Knockout' Highland Dancing, Judo and Police Dog Displays and a 2.5 mile People's Race. The many sides stalls this year included an enterprising Craft Fair.
